snippet.title: Digital Dance Mix, Vol. 1: Namie Amuro [Saturn] by SEGA [HD] [1080p]
snippet.description:
Digital Dance Mix, Vol. 1: Namie Amuro (デジタルダンスミックス　Ｖｏｌ．１　安室　奈美恵) is a 1997 title developed by Sega AM2 for the Saturn. It features a highly detailed model of Japanese pop singer Namie Amuro performing two of her biggest hits, "Chase the Chance" and "You're My Sunshine." The game was primarily intended as a tech demo with the knowledge gained from development being applied to the unreleased Saturn version of Virtua Fighter 3. Subsequent volumes starring other artists were likely planned but never came to fruition.

Check out my other Digital Dance Mix videos below:

Digital Dance Mix - http://youtu.be/QyJLAlCbF3A
Mini-games - http://youtu.be/x2E3C_D-7Io

Enjoy the video? Remember to like, comment, and subscribe!
Twitter: @SaturnMemories

Digital Dance Mix, Vol. 1: Namie Amuro (デジタルダンスミックス　Ｖｏｌ．１　安室　奈美恵, 디지털 댄스 믹스 Vol. 1 아무로 나미에, 安室奈美惠數碼混合舞蹈) | GS-9133 | Sega Corporation (株式会社セガ, 주식회사 세가, 世嘉公司) | Sega AM2 (株式会社SEGA-AM2) | Yu Suzuki (鈴木裕, 스즈키 유) | Sega Saturn (セガサターン, 세가 새턴, 世嘉土星) | [SS] | Namie Amuro (安室　奈美恵, 아무로 나미에) | Chase the Chance (チェイス・ザ・チャンス) | You're My Sunshine (ユア・マイ・サンシャイン)  | Pop Music, J-Pop (ポップ・ミュージック, 팝 음악, 流行音乐) | Virtua Fighter 3 (バーチャファイター3, 버추어 파이터 3, VR快打3) | Emulator (エミュレータ, 에뮬레이터, 游戏机模拟器) | SSF | High-definition (高精細, 고선명, 高解析) | HD | 1080p
